page.title: 07MILL FARM.
page.content: { MILL FARM:}Mill farm was built in 1847,as a dairy farm.This is its main product today.They do also sell ice-cream,yoghurt,eggs and potatoes. They milk the cows at 5.30a.m it takes them ninety minutes to milk 50 cows. They are Guernsey cows. The farmer buys some of the animal feed such as concentrated pellets, but grows his own straw and hay. The farm has been in the family for 51 years,all four people who work on the farm are in the Fitch family,who bought Mill Farm when the Chenies Manor Estate was sold by the Duke of Bedford in 1954.The farm is average in size for this area,and is 80 acres. Milk is collected by bulk tanker and cows are bought and sold in Tring or Slough market.Mr.Fitch has a lovely house and garden.He says farming is his life, and does not want to retire.
